skin_id_15.label: Fix Released
skin_id_15.name: [Breakout Rewards] Prev. unlocked Legends appear locked, but can be used
skin_id_15.desc: If you have previously unlocked one of the Legends featured in Breakout Rewards, these are still permanently unlocked for you. The gold lock and check are indicators of their participation in this event, and the pop-up language is being updated.

skin_id_23.label: Fix Released
skin_id_23.name: [Xbox] Game crashing due to console language being unsupported
skin_id_23.desc:
#

If your console is set to Swedish, Norwegian, Dutch, Finnish, Danish, Turkish, or Hungarian, please temporarily swap to a different language if possible to resume playing in the interim.
